description: React component for the checkout page, handling order summary, Stripe payment integration, and order submission.

methods.name: Checkout()
methods.description: React functional component that renders the checkout page with order summary and Stripe payment integration. Handles session creation and order submission.

methods.name: pay
methods.description: Function triggered on 'Pay now' button click; activates payment process, creates an order record, clears cart, and navigates to orders page.
